scenario_text.value: Naw, no luck. Sheesh, that jerk is fast.

(Piemon’s stragglers are looking for
someone? The traitor they mentioned before?)

(But wait, those guys live here, right? They
might know about the shrine. Let’s ask.)
Hey, you guys... Can I ask you something?
Wha—?! That jerk’s one of Piemon’s enemies!
